Description:
IDEAL INVESTMENT OR HOLIDAY HOME
Located in central Cowes, this property would make the ideal investment or holiday home.
The open plan kitchen/living area features a Coonara wood fire and reverse cycle heating and cooling split system.
There are three generous sized bedrooms, two with built in robes and the bathroom has a shower and bath, with a separate toilet.
The land size is 615m2 (approx) with a large garage at the rear of the block plus added space for three cars to be parked at the front of the home.
It is only a short drive from the main street and the north facing beaches of Cowes.
This property is currently tenanted and 24 hours’ notice for inspections is required.
Insights: 11 Ti Tree Drive, Cowes VIC 3922 was last sold in 2018 and 63 other 3 bedroom house in Cowes have recently been sold.

Description:
TOWNHOUSE W/POOL ONLY 200 METERS TO BEACH
Location Location. We hear it all the time. Why? Because it pays to be in the right position. If you're looking for a fabulous property to holiday in, and also provide a holiday rental return, look no further. This beautiful townhouse has it all. Ground floor, double garage with secure entry, a ground floor living space, double bedroom, separate bathroom and under stair storage and entry to a rear courtyard with low maintenance. Upstairs a spacious light filled open plan living space and kitchen, two more double bedrooms with built in robes, a second bathroom and upstairs deck great for the barbeque and outdoor setting.With all furniture included in your purchase price.
Call today to arrange your private inspection, we require 24 hours' notice as the property is currently tenanted.

Description:
It's Oh So Quiet!
Located in a quiet cul de sac in a highly sought after area, which is only 400 metres from the foreshore reserve, is this single level home.
Offering spacious open plan kitchen, living and dining, four bedrooms, two bathrooms, study/utility room, the master is complete with a walk in robe and ensuite.
Additional features include raked ceilings to main living, split system heating and cooling, carpet and vinyl planks throughout, private backyard at the rear and a North facing and expansive outdoor entertainment area at the front.
Set within a 668sqm approx fenced allotment and with a great tenancy in place this property would be ideal for investment purposes or permanent living.
This property for sale in Cowes is proudly presented to you by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.

Description:
Absolute stunning bay views!
Situated opposite the beach on the third floor of the prestigious "Bayview Grande" apartment building, this spacious north facing apartment boasts spectacular views of Westernport Bay, the beach and the Peninsula beyond.
Features include three generous size bedrooms, two bathrooms, laundry and open plan living/dining area, easily capable of accommodating a large family. An attractive kitchen with stainless steel appliances compliments this area.
The large north facing balcony, ideal for outdoor entertaining or just relaxing; taking in the view is an added feature.
Lift access and secure under building parking and storage makes life easier and the indoor heated pool and spa will impress.
A perfect holiday or investment property with a history of excellent rental returns.
This property for sale in Cowes, is proudly presented to you by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.

Description:
BRAND NEW!
Whether you are looking for a permanent residence, an investment opportunity or a holiday home – look no further. This 3 bedroom open plan living home is impeccably presented throughout. The master has a spacious walk in robe and master ensuite and the remaining 2 bedrooms are of a generous size and have BIRs. There is polished concrete floor throughout the living zone of the house and carpets to all bedrooms.
The kitchen has loads of room to move around the island bench, a 900 stainless steel cook top and a walk in pantry with more cupboard space. There is ducted heating throughout, alfresco dining and quality blinds on all windows.
The property has a double garage with direct entry and also side access with gates providing a perfect home for a boat or caravan. There is also a permit in place for a 6.2 x 3.2 garage at the rear of the property, with access via an established crossover due to the corner block location.
Inspection by appointment. Please call now to book in your time.

Description:
ROOM FOR YOUR FAMILY AND FRIENDS
This is a rare opportunity to purchase a high energy rated brand new modern home in the Exclusive Seagrove Estate on Phillip Island.
Featuring a grand entrance with 4 bedrooms. Master
with a full ensuite and walk in robe, 3 large double bedrooms, all with built in robes compliment the remaining bedrooms.
The 1st living area offers a full northerly aspect and is a great place to sit back relax and read that novel.
The 2nd living area adjoins the kitchen and dining area, with a full northerly aspect, open plan hostess kitchen with a HUGE walk in pantry, 900mm hot plates & oven, dishwasher, stone benches and a large island bench compliment this exceptional family area.
A special feature is the industrial grade timber vinyl flooring through- out! With carpet located in the bedrooms and living zones and tiles in the wet areas.
The undercover outdoor living area with a full northerly aspect and is great place to enjoy the long summer evenings with family and friends.
Double gates to one side of the property allows room for the boat or caravan.

HOLIDAY HIDEAWAY

Located only a short distance to Cowes main street and beaches you will find the quiet street of Koala. This home is set on approximately 676m2 in a perfect position to allow side access to build a rear garage and spacious back yard.
The home has been built to take in the north facing sun with the stunning covered deck that brings you into the large open plan living, kitchen and dining area.
At the rear of the home you will find the 3 generous bedrooms all with BIR and a Family bathroom to suit.
The owners of this beautiful home have take care with upgrading the engineered timber flooring and creating a true beach home so all you have to do is move in and enjoy this property.
This property will surely tick all the boxes so call today to arrange your private inspection 5952 2633

Description:
Fabulous Location; Fabulous Water View!
With only a few short steps to the gorgeous north facing bay beach and leisurely stroll to shops, restaurants and cafe's makes this apartment ideal for permanent or holiday living! Located on the ground level of The Waves complex is this spacious, beautifully presented apartment offering stunning water views across to French Island.
This fantastic apartment comprises a lovely kitchen/dining and bedroom area, a stylish family bathroom featuring a corner spa bath and separate shower and the main room which includes a dressing table and study desk leaving ample room for a queen size bed and lounge suite. A large sliding door opens onto an outdoor terrace and lovely lawn area, capturing envious water views; just perfect for relaxing with family and friends.
Additional features include split system heating/cooling, electric cooktop, ground level access perfect for all ages
This property for sale in Cowes is proudly presented by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.

Description:
BRAND NEW FOUR BEDROOM HOME / SHEARWATER ESTATE
Shearwater is a premier lifestyle residential estate in Cowes, Phillip Island, and is located next to the Phillip Island Golf Club, only 700m from the majestic Silverleaves beach, and only a few minutes drive to Cowes primary school, the new medical hub, cafes, restaurants and the retail precinct. Surrounded by 5 hectares of wetlands, walking tracks, abundant bird life and lush village parklands, this exciting 'BRAND NEW' quality 4 Bedroom brick home with double garage, has been constructed by one of Melbourne's leading and most reputable builders, and sits on low maintenance bespoke fully landscaped allotment.
As you walk into this home you will instantly feel the abundance of space and the light, bright open feel resulting from the full northerly aspects of the kitchen, dining and main living area. The master bedroom/parents retreat is huge with a full walk in wardrobe and personal ensuite. The 3 large extra bedrooms give you plenty of room for your family and friends. The first living space provides a separate zone which can be used as a living/rumpus/entertainment room or even an office. The second living space adjoins the large hostess kitchen with stone bench tops, dishwasher and a quality 900mm stainless steel oven and cook top, that opens up to a rear courtyard with endless sweeping rural views.
Invest or Occupy? This property is available for immediate occupancy, and with high rental demands currently for this estate, combined with solid rental returns and capitol growth, this property is also a must see for a potential investors.
Surrounded by Quality near new homes, inspection is highly recommended...

Description:
Coastal Living At It's Best!
This fabulous property located within walking distance to the Cowes shopping precinct and the beautiful bay beach presents a great opportunity to secure your ideal holiday or permanent home reflecting a great beach lifestyle with inviting indoor and outdoor entertaining areas boasting a heated in ground pool surrounded by lush lawn with plenty of space to relax as well as an outdoor shower all with a gorgeous northerly aspect.
The lower level of the home comprises a large bedroom with built in robes and split system heating/cooling as well as a laundry combined bathroom and under stair storage.
The second level features a spacious light filled open plan kitchen, living and dining area boasting gleaming polished timber floors, high ceilings, fresh white walls and a gas log fire, two bedrooms both with built in robes, a huge main bathroom and separate toilet. A sliding door from the living area opens onto a sunny entertaining balcony, perfect for alfresco dining whilst capturing the water glimpses to the north. The stylish and well appointed kitchen which overlooks the living area, features an island bench, stainless steel dishwasher, gas cooktop with a stainless steel canopy range hood and under bench oven.
Other great features include: Double carport with extra space, garden shed and fully fenced
If you're looking for a low maintenance home, close to everything with a wonderful environment, this property is beachside living at it's best!
This property in Cowes is proudly presented to you by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island

Description:
Loaded with Appeal!
Only a short stroll to the Popular Red Rocks beach is this single level, low maintenance, brick veneer home. Comprising spacious open plan living, kitchen and dining area with cathedral ceilings and exposed timber beams throughout; providing lots of warmth and character, three robed bedrooms and one bathroom.
The residence has a host of additional features including combustion heating, split system heating and cooling, ceiling fans, highlight windows to the living space, bath, electric cooking, timber kitchen and a full length undercover verandah.
All of this is set within a 606sqm approx. fully fenced allotment with an established garden and driveway that leads you to the garage/workshop at the rear with concrete flooring.
There is currently a great tenancy in place making this home ideal for young families, retirees or investors alike.
This property for sale in Cowes, is proudly presented by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.

Description:
LAST LOT AVAILABLE, TITLED AND READY TO BUILD.
If you are looking to purchase one of the only allotments close to the water then look no further.
Shearwater has SOLD OUT so be quick to get a fantastic allotment of approx 500m2.
Titled land and ready to build a new home and take advantage of the location and position just near the Shearwater lake.
The SHEARWATER estate, is a great place to live with spectacular wetlands area, boardwalks and walking tracks. The estate is centrally located to the Phillip Island golf course, with the front nine at your doorstep and the back nine running along the length of the estate.
Silverleaves Beach is only a short walk (700m approx) away, with the Heathlands of Rhyll and walking track just a short distance in the opposite direction.
Call today to secure your land for your future.

Description:
A Seaside Opportunity Awaits!
Situated on a generous 631sqm (approx) allotment in a sought after central Cowes location, is this superb two story home. A short walk away from everything that Cowes has to offer, including great cafe's, restaurants and boutique shops, and the beautiful sheltered Cowes bay beach.
The home is inviting, with light filled living spaces, and is perfect for summer entertaining.
Downstairs living, kitchen, dining make this an appealing property to families or couples of all ages. Also on this level, are 2 bedrooms, with a family bathroom, toilet and separate laundry. The lower north facing rear deck is a great place to enjoy a sun drenched afternoon and a barbeque with family and friends.
Upstairs, a spacious second living area with access to the upstairs balcony (also north facing - with external staircase) where you can escape to gorgeous water glimpses of Westernport Bay - offering the perfect spot to relax and enjoy the beachside atmosphere. A further 2 bedrooms, separate bathroom and toilet, and ample storage complete this level.
Outside the features continue, with a bungalow - which could convert into additional accommodation, or as a great retreat or games room. A practical outside toilet, low maintenance gardens, single carport - providing room for the boat or caravan, and beautiful established trees - create a functional outdoor space.
Other features include: 2 x split systems for heating/cooling and all year round comfort and a brand new hot water service.
With huge potential, in a great location - this property would be ideal for permanent living, holiday home or as a fantastic addition to your investment portfolio.
This property for sale in Cowes is proudly presented by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.

Description:
The Ultimate In Stylish Living
This immaculately presented double storey coastal residence of surprising spaces boasts generous indoor and outdoor living and entertaining areas complemented by beautiful tropical landscaped gardens creating an enviable lifestyle!
The lower level comprises a spacious open plan living, dining and kitchenette area, with beautiful floor tiles throughout, flows seamlessly between two fabulous outdoor entertaining spaces, perfect to sit back and relax with family and friends whilst taking in the gorgeous surrounds. Also on this level are two generous sized bedrooms, a family bathroom with a spa bath, laundry, under stair storage and direct access to the double remote garage.
A fabulous light filled stairwell leads up to a very spacious open plan main living, dining and kitchen area, with lovely polished timber floors throughout, which leads onto an expansive north facing covered entertaining deck. The exquisite gourmet kitchen features a 900mm gas cooktop, an electric double oven and microwave, dishwasher, pull out pantry and gorgeous stone benchtops with waterfall ends. The master bedroom features it's own study nook, a walk through robe, stylish dual access ensuite with walk in shower and double vanity and a separate toilet.
Some of the many wonderful features of this immaculate home include: ducted vacuum system, stunning Tasmanian Oak flooring, two split system heating/cooling units, quality fixtures and fittings throughout, stainless steel appliances, garden shed
This exceptional home, set on a 603sqm approx fully fenced allotment and walking distance to the amazing north facing bay beach and shops is perfectly tailored for relaxed permanent living or dual family escapes. Inspection is a must!
This property for sale in Cowes is proudly presented by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.

Description:
MAGNIFICENT 5-ACRE LIFE STYLE PROPERTY
Feel a million miles away in this nature lifestyle property which is privately nestled away on an allotment of 5 acres (approx.) yet is so close to the centre of Cowes and the beach.
This magnificent family home offers four bedrooms, master with ensuite and walk in robe. A large open plan kitchen, dining and lounge area with a coonara wood fire heater, a theater room and a central main bathroom with separate toilet.
Outside boasts a three bay shed that is fully plumbed, a huge entertainment shed/area, machinery sheds, skate ramps, basketball court, a bike track and beautifully landscaped gardens.
Other features include polished concrete floors and split system to the open plan living zone, downlights throughout and a cubby house and plenty of room for the kids.
5-acre allotments in Phillip Island are very difficult to find.
Phone Peter Buitenhuis on 0407 045 525 for a private viewing.

Description:
PRICED TO SELL!
Boasting the most beautiful views of the bay from the top level, this apartment is a luxurious get away for you and the family.
This apartment is absolutely immaculate, featuring a bedroom suite with lounge and East facing balcony to enjoy a morning cuppa in the sunshine overlooking the water. The bathroom is fully equipped with additional cabinetry and spa bath. The kitchen is modern with modified features to accommodate all possible functional extras you could think of! The second living and dining area duals as a second bedroom space, ensuring the apartment can comfortably sleep four.
This apartment is the perfect holiday retreat for the family, and equally an investment opportunity for a first home buyer or savvy investor.
Leave the car at home as this apartment is a walk to everything! Situated in prestige position across the road from the family friendly Cowes foreshore Beach, playground, Cowes Jetty, local restaurants and bars and shopping precincts. This is one opportunity you don’t want to miss!
Book an inspection today.

Description:
WALK TO THE BEACH – JUST LIKE NEW TOWNHOUSE
What a great location!!! This property has been loved and maintained by the present owners, and is situated in a great position where you can walk to the beach and the town centre. Downstairs offers two full bedrooms, a kitchenette, bathroom and 1st living area or fourth bedroom with access to a private patio area. The upstairs area features a massive full kitchen with stone bench that leads to a large dining area and formal lounge with a full northerly aspect and water glimpses and access to the large outdoor deck area, the HUGE master bedroom offers full ensuite facilities with direct access to the undercover outdoor living space deck. This is the front townhouse of only 2 on the site, giving you that nice open feeling with plenty of space and light.
A real stunning feature of this unique property is the 2 living zones that offers complete privacy from each – Yet only minutes to one of the few north facing beaches in Australia. The low maintenance established native garden and extensive paving is ready to enjoy.
